## bulkDelete variable

Deletes all Firestore documents matching the provided `query`<!-- -->.

This is a Firestore transaction. Either all documents are deleted, or none is.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bulkDelete: ({ query }: BulkDeleteConfig) => Promise<{
    doc_ids: {
        deleted: string[];
        skipped: string[];
    };
    message: string;
}>
```
